["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"本镜像包含 amd64, arm64, armel, armhf, i386 架构处理器的软件包。"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"手动替换","children":"手动替换"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["编辑 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list"}]," 文件，在文件最前面添加以下条目："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/apt/sources.list","menus":[{"title":"启用源码镜像","items":[["否",{"enable_source":"# "}],["是",{"enable_source":""}]]}],"code":"deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}} kali-rolling main non-free contrib non-free-firmware
{{enable_source}}deb-src {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}} kali-rolling main non-free contrib non-free-firmware","codeLanguage":"properties"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"sed-替换","children":"sed 替换"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"执行如下命令 sed 替换"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}sed -i "s@http://http.kali.org/kali@{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}@g" /etc/apt/sources.list","codeLanguage":"bash"}]]}]

meta.title: Kali 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
